name: 7 Billion Humans
description: Automate swarms of office workers to solve puzzles inside your very own parallel computer made of people....a thrilling followup to the award winning Human Resource Machine. Now with more humans!
minimum_requirements: Mínimos: SO: XP or later Processador: 2.0Ghz CPU Memória: 1 GB de RAM Placa de vídeo: graphics card that supports Shader Model 2.0 or greater DirectX: Versão 9.0c Armazenamento: 200 MB de espaço disponível
